content.raw:
The `UsvWindPlugin::update()`

* Gets a random number
* Uses that random number to create a wind speed
* Calculates relative wind speed that the WAM-V ‘feels’
* Puts a force on the COM of the WAM-V

**How would you recommend I test the repeatability of the wind?** 

This function does not ‘expose’ any of these numbers, and so far I have only added a gzmsg line for preliminary testing. Should I:

* add a ros\_publisher or something to expose the wind and then write a Google test to check that it matches what it should be with a given seed value
* run a Google test that simply sets the seed value, doesn’t send commands to the boat, and then checks its position after a few seconds \(assuming the same wind would hopefully mean that it ends in the same spot\)
* something else
